panels.description: "good" can be lower than "enriched" when a single payload includes multiple events.
panels.title: Kafka messages created per second

panels.description: "raw" can be lower than the sum of other metrics when a single payload includes multiple events.
panels.title: Snowplow enricher - processed events per second

panels.description: The time that passes between collector queuing an event and enricher putting it back into kafka
panels.title: Snowplow enricher latency

panels.description: SSL errors from Vector, Kafka, or the Snowplow Enricher

panels.description: Status of the certificates. Values are True, False or Unknown.
panels.title: Certificates
